explains: n. 认识，意识；感悟能力
wordGroup: environmental awareness 环境意识；环保意识
brand awareness 品牌意识，商标意识；品牌知名度
strengthen the awareness 提高意识；强化意识
self-protection awareness 自我保护意识
global awareness 全球意识；完整的意识，知觉

sentences.en: The 1980s brought an awareness of green issues.
He was tortured by an awareness of the equivocal nature of his position.
sentences.cn: 他意识到很难解释自己的立场，因此备受折磨。

sentences.en: The project should raise general awareness about bullying.
sentences.cn: 这个项目应该引起对恃强凌弱现象的普遍注意。
